item.title: Lower Cargo Door Hinge Drive Units

remarks.para: Both electrical and manual drive function may be inoperative.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "CARGO DOOR HINGE DRIVE UNITS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: See MM 52-34-00 Maintenance Practices for manual open/close operation of the door, as necessary.
